context: Good Morning what have you seen recently?
Hi I have seen Thor: Ragnarok (2017) It was actually funny also!
I haven't seen it other than funny how was it Have you seen the new The Avengers (2012)
Yes I have it was good!
I would have to say The Wiz (1978) Have you seen it?
OMG that is a old classic lol who haven't seen that movie
You would be surprised at how many people havent! I think it is better then the original!
resp: Okay! but yea a good one for sure. What about Deadpool 2 (2018)
